J.'..1. ........ ...........[S DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY Of HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY'S GOVERNMENT)PERMANENT COURT OP INTERNATIONAL JUSTICE,SCopy of telegram from the Secretary-General, League of Nations to the Secretary, Cabinet, received September 20th,1921.Acting under the unanimous decision of the Assembly of the League of Nations, I have the honour to bring to your attention that the election of Judges of the ^permanent Court of International Justice having been completed, this Court is now definitely established.I.DENTIAL.CABINET.3323.LEAGUE OP NATIONS.(Oirdulated for Information),ERIC LRUMMOND.L Whitehall Gardens. S.W. September 20th. 1921.
